post.body: Worst part is I didn't know that the speed on the interstate had gone from 70 to 55 MPH. Feel free to donate. ;)
If they need an example they can look at this. :P http://snipr.com/8zf8h
Yea, Twitter would be a good tool for them to use. Set up a Paypal donation page or something like that and there you go.
And don't forget that TWIP will be one!
Thats really cool. Although the name did throw me off just a bit. lol. But I'm sure that is not the first time you heard that.
And I bet you think that it is the cutest thing in the world.
Thats cool. Like a soup kitchen or something like that?
Yes really. I generally don't go to bed until about 1:30 sometimes much later, but I try not to do that.
Wow! I have to have my Christmas list done for my Grandparents by the beginning of November.
I know what you mean, 2 AM will be that time for me.
Well, 12 PM happened here over 12 hrs ago.
Well, considerings that most parts of the country don't have good 3G service I don't think it matters. Where I live there is no 3G.
You can get one without a contract, but you have to pay a hefty penalty for not activating it. At least that is what I think.
And think, you only need a few thousand more to crack the top 10. lol
BOOOO!!!
RT @ronbrinkmann: True Story: The elevator in my building always stops on the 13th floor - but nobody ever gets on or off...
RT @Forian: Are you willing to fight for global integrity? If so, step forward. - http://ping.fm/A0ThB - Join Army For Good.
Installing RIse of Nations in XP in VMware Fusion. Going to see how it works before I try a newer PC game.
Call me crazy, stupid, or psycho. But I want to sit down with Charles Manson and talk to him. Just to get into his mind and learn about him.
Installing XP Updates for XP that I'm running in VMware Fusion. Who would have ever thought I would be doing such a thing.
